scopecontent.p: “Biographies of [American] homeopathic physicians, collected and arranged [in 35 alphabetical scrapbooks] in twenty years…”, 1916, by T.L. Bradford, Hahnemann class of 1869, and for many years its librarian. Includes portraits; letters; clippings from homeopathic journals, newspapers, homeopathic biographical sources such as King and Cleave, etc. Also included is one volume (A-G) of completed alumni data forms, 1916-17, apparently used in preparation for the 1918 Alumni Index.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
